title: Betrayed
description: You don't mess with Rosie Gilmour and get away with it.Crime reporter Rosie Gilmour is back at The Post, bruised and battered from her last investigation but determined to find missing barmaid Wendy Graham.Convinced that Wendy is the key to an explosive new story, Rosie's search leads her deep into the dangerous world of Glasgow's Ulster Volunteer Force.This time, Rosie will find herself at the mercy of the most vicious gangsters she's ever encountered.Has she met her match?
author: Anna        Smith
